alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:09PM MST until December 26 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 3 to 5 inches along I-15 from Black Ridge south to near New Harmony, with 1 to 3 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along I-15 south of Cedar City beginning late this evening, as well as other area roadways through the overnight hours. Strong cross winds can be expected along east-west facing routes. Gusty south winds may also result in considerable blowing and drifting of new snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
